message.name: ERR_CASEURGENTFLAG_XFV_START_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before today.

message.name: ERR_CASEURGENTFLAG_XFV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_CASEURGENTFLAG_XFV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, can not be before today.

message.name: ERR_CASEURGENTFLAG_XFV_END_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, can not be in future.

message.name: ERR_CASEURGENTFLAG_OVERLAPS_IN_SPECIFIED_DATE_RANGE
message.locale: A Urgent flag with type of "%1s", already exists which overlaps with the time period specified.
